description:
The battle against Acrobatic Silky is over, Aira harbors romantic feelings stemming from how Okarun had saved her. As Momo, Okarun, and Aira`s feelings intertwine, Serpoians make another appearance, and the three of them are trapped in void space.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: なんかモヤモヤするじゃんよ.
